website_summaries.verdict: The quick replacement hydraulic oil filter that does not skimp on overall performance. Good budget alternative.
pros: Simple design is compatible with many different tools and brands
Comes with a large filter for faster filtration of a high volume of liquid
Will resist corrosion from the elements
cons: Enclosed design makes it difficult to work on or repair the filter itself

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bent my oem transaxle filter on my John Deere and needed one quick to fix the leak...found this on amazon for a decent price and it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: m_c_c_o_y

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine. Used it on my John Deere x485's hydrostatic transmission.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Stens hydraulic filter
customer_reviews.text: I had to change my hydro fluid in my zero turn and since Stens make great products I went with this one and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Seller experience was fine, just disappointed because it is not an exact ...
customer_reviews.text: Not an exact replacement for the Simplicity 1726194SM filter as listed in the description. It does screw on ok, but it is shorter in length and there are fewer holes for the fluid to pass through. Even though this filter is $30 less expensive than the Simplicity 1726194SM, I did not want to risk damage to a several thousand dollar transmission to save $30. Seller experience was fine, just disappointed because it is not an exact match.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great filter and the price is a lot better than name brand than came on my mower will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little extra and get a high quality filter
customer_reviews.text: Good quality filter, much better than a Fram from what I've been hearing. No way to back that up, but I've been reading it a lot lately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did the job
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a JD z445 25hp Kawasaki -- much cheaper than buying from the dealer. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Filter review
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good. Not much else to add about it. Loved the color!
customer_reviews.author: joni Scott

customer_reviews.title: quality of filter is good.
customer_reviews.text: Filter fit perfectly no issues, quality of filter is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Performed as advertised at a great price and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Filter
customer_reviews.text: I ran a tractor parts store for several years and we sold many of these filters. Never had a single complaint. I currently us it on a Kawasaki engine that is installed on my John Deere mower.
customer_reviews.author: J. Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's a filter. It fit my X720. It doesn't leak. It's black. What more could a person ask? Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Louie from Waterloo  Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Wrong one
customer_reviews.text: Wrong one! need more info when ordering the filter,It did not fit the model that I had ordered it for
customer_reviews.author: Richard Orr
